title: Situated Design Model-Based Mathematics Education for Strengthening Practical Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Project implementing mathematical modeling solutions for real workplace problems, collaborative learning environment using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can design mathematical problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy by analyzing real-world work scenarios
Learners can present creative solutions for non-repetitive problems (e.g., budget optimization, risk analysis) at least three times according to situational design models
Learners can revise project deliverables at least twice incorporating peer feedback and achieve over 90% completion in final outputs
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
